name: Accepta® BG520
description: Accepta® BG520 or BROMGARD 520 is a heavy metal free, silicate based blend of inorganic and organic scale and corrosion inhibitors combined with a bromine pre-cursor. The product provides scale and corrosion control over a wide range of water qualities and operational conditions. When used in conjunction with ACTIVATOR 120 or 150 the correct level of “bromine” is released to control microbiological growth in the system.
